title: Robotask v3.1
description:
Robotask.v3.1

It can automate any series of tasks you can do on your computer system
RoboTask can easily automate any series of tasks on your computer system, whether you are a novice
or advanced user. You don&#039;t even have to know how to program?use RoboTask to build your own automated solutions
quickly and easily. Yet RoboTask is powerful.

RoboTask will help users avoid losing important information when they will create a backup task for
placing files on a remote server.

The software can manage and trigger a wide variety of repetitive tasks to save your valuable time.
With RoboTask, you don&#039;t need complicated batch files or scripts.

Here are many examples of what RoboTask can do for you:
Ã‚Â· Runs applications and open documents.
Ã‚Â· Manages automatic backups.
Ã‚Â· Alerts you of any changes in your folders.
Ã‚Â· Shuts down Windows and powers off your computer triggered by any event you choose.
Ã‚Â· Processes files and folders (copies, moves, renames, deletes).
Ã‚Â· Works with FTP and Web servers (downloads, uploads, etc).
Ã‚Â· Sends letters and files by e-mail.
Ã‚Â· Starts and stops Windows NT services.
Ã‚Â· Sends network
messages as WinPopups.
Ã‚Â· Acts as an alarm clock.

RoboTask can be used for an unlimited number of tasks. When creating a task, you decide what the task
needs to do and when. Every task has two parts:
Ã‚Â· Actions
Ã‚Â· Triggering events

Actions

First, you must decide what actions you want to accomplish. You can select built-in actions in RoboTask
to accomplish the following:

Ã‚Â· Run applications.
Ã‚Â· Open or print documents.
Ã‚Â· Emulate your keystrokes.
Ã‚Â· File and folder processing (copy, move, delete, rename, synchronize folders).
Ã‚Â· Work with FTP servers (download, upload, rename, delete).
Ã‚Â· Work with e-mail (check for e-mail, send e-mail).
Ã‚Â· Work with ZIP files (pack files, extract files).
Ã‚Â· Work with windows (focus, maximize, minimize, restore, close, hide, unhide).
Ã‚Â· Flow control (if-then, file loop, text loop, dataset loop, and so forth).

Triggering events

A triggering event can be one of the following:
Ã‚Â· A specific time
Ã‚Â· When something happens on your computer.

Practically anything that happens on your computer can trigger RoboTask to perform an action. An example
would be when RoboTask automatically updates a log and uploads it to a website whenever you receive an email
with a subject that is a particular string of words or contains a word such as "Important".

The following are examples of triggering events:
Ã‚Â· Scheduler (at a specified time).
Ã‚Â· Hot Keys (when a special key is pressed).
Ã‚Â· Tray Icon (when you double-click it).
Ã‚Â· File Monitor (when a particular file is created, destroyed, changed, renamed).
Ã‚Â· Dial-up Connection Monitor (when a connection is made or broken).
Ã‚Â· Window Watcher (when a window is created, activated, closed, and so forth).
Ã‚Â· System Events (time, spooler, device, display changed, log on, log off, on idle). 

-------------------------------

Use crack.

Enjoy!!
